name: All My Victims Cloak
flavor: Made from the torn cloaks of other Hunters. Other, lesser Hunters.

name: AOS#Cryptid Cloak
flavor: "Out there? All that is a job. Here, in the Crucible - this is a life."

name: Arc Flayer Mantle
flavor: A mantle of woven Arc energy strings taken from the Psion Flayer Kolar.

name: Aspriet Cloak
flavor: "Fly high. Strike hard. Repeat." —Ain Suhu-ässä

name: Astrolord Cloak
flavor: History's lords have ever painted the future in tones of fire and shadow.

name: Ayane Takanome's Cloak
flavor: Ayane Takanome was no Guardian, but the City still remembers how she and her Rangers secured the refugee roads.

name: Bladedancer's Cloak
flavor: "These blades…they're an extension of your arm, your reflexes, your Light."

name: Bloodstained Hood
flavor: "Those Jaguar militant types seem a little extreme." —a person of inadequate ferocity

name: Brawler's Cloak
flavor: Hunters may be averse to centralized organization, but nothing is more fearsome than a coordinated stalk.

name: Buckaroo's Cloak
flavor: Meanwhile, back at the ranch...

name: Chaos Cloak
flavor: There is no doubt that our future will be won in battle.

name: Cloak of Atropos
flavor: One boast goes, "When Cabal see my cloak, they flee." Another goes, 'Look at all these dead Cabal!'

name: Cloak of Desolation
flavor: Shield yourself from the night.

name: Cloak of Dredgen Yor
flavor: Before he took Pahanin's Light, Dredgen Yor ruled the Crucible, the notorious Thorn at his side.

name: Cloak of Hidden Agendas
flavor: "Tell a Titan only a madman would go. Tell a Warlock it's too complex." - Pahanin Errata

name: Cloak of Immanent War
flavor: A new dawn breaks. Feel how it burns.

name: Cloak of Keen Eyes
flavor: "My ancestors were born beyond the Walls, on the long march to the City."

name: Cloak of No Tomorrow
flavor: Tomorrow will be as yesterday was. There will always be a battle to be won.

name: Cloak of Oblivion
flavor: Our salvation lies ahead of us. Go forth. There is nothing left to leave behind.

name: Cloak of Order
flavor: The City prospers on our field of order and justice.

name: Cloak of Perception
flavor: "Have you walked the ruins? Seen the machines born from the lightning? We face a mighty foe."

name: Cloak of Ragged Fortune
flavor: Sometimes a Hunter will lose a cloak in a bet. It's poor form to replace it right away.

name: Cloak of Repair
flavor: We'll carve our future through the will of the people.

name: Cloak of Reverence
flavor: The stylized twin arc represents the world beneath the Traveler.

name: Cloak of Seven Bones
flavor: "Let this bone I reaped in battle give me strength to reap again."

name: Cloak of Solitude
flavor: The tattered remnants of a lost veteran's cloak, handed down as a reminder and a warning.

name: Cloak of Taniks
flavor: He of the endless troves of arms, and legs, and hearts, and lungs, and…

name: Cloak of Tekmor
flavor: When an old Hunter wears a simple cloak, ask yourself where she got it, and what the cloth remembers.

name: Cloak of the Apsides
flavor: "The Hunter creed calls us outward. And what do we find out there? Hard vacuum. Respect it."

name: Cloak of the Cosmonaut
flavor: Vladimir Komarov helped build and fly Earth's first ships. He gave his life to the frontier.

name: Cloak of the Dusktorn
flavor: "I'll remember the Light. Will it remember me?" - Sai Mota

name: Cloak of the Exile
flavor: "Was he exiled? Did he leave willingly? Was the parting angry? Peaceful? Is he dead? Alive? In a word: yes." —Sister Faora

name: Cloak of the Exodus
flavor: Find the way.

name: Cloak of the Hidden
flavor: "The shadows dance quickly among the dust. Make them your ally." - Eris

name: Cloak of the Ironsworn
flavor: "Those who find victory in the Crucible will win salvation for our City." - Iron Banner maxim

name: Cloak of the Justicars
flavor: In pursuit of the City's safety, our jurisdiction is unlimited.

name: Cloak of the Leopard
flavor: Legend says that no animal was more difficult to hunt than the leopard.

name: Cloak of the Mantis
flavor: "Patient camouflage and precise violence. No wonder they survived."

name: Cloak of the Pariah
flavor: "I wear his symbols proudly in the City, to remind them that Osiris is not truly gone." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Cloak of the Reefrunners
flavor: "The child asked me if the Awoken were blue because they were cold. Then he called my cloak a blanket."

name: Cloak of the Rising
flavor: The New Monarchy is the aegis that guards humanity.

name: Cloak of the Shadowjacks
flavor: Twilight Gap highlighted the desperate need for proactive strikes to keep the enemy off balance.

name: Cloak of the Shadowsmiths
flavor: "It's already being handled." - Cayde-6, in an emergency session of the City Consensus

name: Cloak of the Sixth Reign
flavor: One throne beneath the howling dark.

name: Cloak of the Skypillar
flavor: Some suggest Saint-14's legendary vigil was enabled by a few roaming Hunters and their bloody culls.

name: Cloak of the Sojourn
flavor: The stars are calling.

name: Cloak of the Unborn
flavor: "Child asked me if I was a clock. I told her yes. I was keeping time until the world would be safe for her."

name: Cloak of the Unfactorable
flavor: "Could the Vex build a model of us? A simulated City, a whole simulated Earth, adrift in the ocean of the Vex intellect?"

name: Cloak of the Unflinching
flavor: Anyone who takes the pathway into orbit will never want to leave it. Challenge the universe.

name: Cloud Walker Tribute
flavor: A cloak which bears the emblem of the Cloud Walkers, the pioneers of the first Exodus.

name: Competitor Match
flavor: "Instinct tells you to cherish victory, but defeat holds all the lessons." —Lord Shaxx

name: Cosmic Joke
flavor: An infamous cloak, scavenged off the corpses of its owners numerous times on the frontier.

name: Cult/Trinary Star
flavor: The mark of the Trinary Star, the hidden cult who curse the Traveler's light.

name: Darkhollow Mantle
flavor: "To even exist in their space is to constantly demand your own existence." —Eris Morn

name: Dead Light Cloak
flavor: "Beyond the Reef. Beyond the Nine." —Arach Jalaal

name: Dead Zone Revolution
flavor: With each Dead Zone charted comes a new cloak pattern from the Hunter elite.

name: Devils' Cloak
flavor: "There are some bargains worthy of any risk."

name: Devils' Disguise
flavor: Hide your face.

name: Drifter's Cloak
flavor: Cut from City textile and worn as a mark of pride by Hunters with big dreams.

name: Dustwalker Cloak
flavor: A good survival cape can be used as a hull patch, bandage, tourniquet, pressure seal, picnic blanket...

name: Dynamo Cloak
flavor: "Your missions: protect the City. Look better than Warlocks. But don't look like you're trying." - Pahanin Errata

name: End Unsung
flavor: A humble cloak worn in tribute to the Guardians who met their end alone in the wild.

name: Extropic Cloak
flavor: "Child came for our robes today. He said the Awoken Hunters needed them, as they were cold." —Warlock doorlog

name: Fieldcraft Hood
flavor: Even vacuum-ready field wire armor should be kept out of the rain. Rig a hood.

name: Fixer Cloak
flavor: I solve problems.

name: Frumious Cloak
flavor: Tell the Warlocks your cloak is frabjous. They respect words they don't understand.

name: Ghost Angel Cloak
flavor: We are an army of the chosen dead.

name: Grinder's Cloak
flavor: "First, check your cloak for damage. Second, inspect yourself for major wounds." - Handbook of (Un)Controversial Advice

name: Gunslinger's Cloak
flavor: In the dark days before the Last City, all a Hunter had was the Light and a steady aim.

name: H_LD Starwinder Cloak
flavor: As the cloak frays, it reveals the ancient works of Li Qingzhao, carved in chips of bone.

name: Harbinger Hood
flavor: A pattern inspired by the legendary Awoken weapon.

name: Hardcase Cloak
flavor: If you learn nothing else, learn this: when a Hunter takes up the cloak of a dead comrade, this is a vow.

name: Heliopause Cloak
flavor: "Once, deep space explorers were seen as heroes. Now, for suggesting humanity should look beyond this system, some call us cowards." —Arach Parnell

name: Highest Squidder
flavor: "Are you squidding me?"

name: Hood of the Night Sun
flavor: "I am not a dashing rogue. I am not a free spirit. I am a claw in the throat of the dark, and I will draw blood."

name: Hood of the Spawn
flavor: "Toland cracked the rune, or led us to believe he did. I told him it was either that, or the Hive have a hell of a recipe for beer." - Omar Agah

name: Hustler's Cloak
flavor: They say you will never find an impractical Hunter. But what do 'they' know about dashing cloaks?

name: Infinite Lines Cloak
flavor: ...pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

name: Iron Camelot Cloak
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Gheleon, he who was a true Guardian to the people.

name: Journey Hood
flavor: It's not the destination that matters.

name: Kallipolis Mantle
flavor: The leader we need is among us, not above us.

name: Kell's Cloak
flavor: "Here's my plan to be Kell. Fallen seem to respect violence and big capes. I'm really violent, and I found this cape."

name: Kellhunter's Hood
flavor: The strongest lead the pack.

name: Kings' Cloak
flavor: "Of which world? All of them."

name: Kings' Mantle
flavor: Fit for royalty.

name: Lead Scout's Cloak
flavor: "To clear mines: step on mine. Wait for Ghost revival. Step on mine 2. Wait for Ghost. Step on - "

name: Legend of Six Coyotes
flavor: A cloak fashioned after the legendary Hunters who first scouted beyond the Cosmodrome wall.

name: Long Tomorrow 9G
flavor: "You didn't tell me this treasure was in the red mists of Murmuring Rock. Count me out."

name: Makeshift Scarf
flavor: The Hunter's cloak speaks to their personality. Your Ghost scrounged up this tough synthetic wrap, marked with an ancient double-headed eagle.

name: Mantle of Efrideet
flavor: Stand in the fire until there is nothing left to burn away.

name: Mantle of Gheleon
flavor: You are an army, an armada, a force unto itself.

name: Mantle of Perun
flavor: Your mark be made, by thunder's crack or lightning's strike.

name: Mantle of Sublime Light
flavor: A trial by fire, the purpose of which is transformation.

name: Maverick's Cloak
flavor: "Bright colors are Mother Nature's way of saying 'don't mess with me.' We like a lot of her ideas."

name: Melting Point
flavor: In the Crucible, you'll find yours.

name: Nagari Cloak
flavor: In this age of Light and fire, simple skills still endure. Hunters embroider signs of war and loss on their cloaks.

name: Neuroghast Cloak
flavor: To control your opponents, you must first control your own body.

name: Night Rain Cloak
flavor: Hunters constantly tweak and upgrade their armor. A cloak is the best mark of recognition.

name: Nightmask Cloak
flavor: "They say the Crucible is preparation for the frontier. I see it the other way around." - Ain Suhu-ässä

name: Nightstalker Cloak
flavor: Live and die by the draw of a bow.

name: Nightstalker's Cloak
flavor: "We are the rangers, the keen-eyed scouts who stalk the Darkness where it dwells."

name: Not A Fallen Hood
flavor: Friendly fire is as deadly as any Fallen skiff, so some Hunters choose cloaks for pure visibility.

name: Octopus Cloak
flavor: "If human extinction seems imminent, try to relax. You're just giving cephalopods a shot." - Pahanin Errata

name: On the Marsh
flavor: Swamp camouflage is the hottest fashion these days.

name: Ones and Zeroes
flavor: Maybe that's all we really are.

name: Pennant Cloak
flavor: Guardians often band together and form close-knit teams to achieve victory in the Crucible.

name: Pilgrim's Cloak
flavor: How many fell on the road to the City? How few made the last leg of the journey with a Ghost over their shoulders?

name: Pleiades Hood
flavor: The enemy sees beyond visual light, so cloth camouflage is difficult. No sense looking drab.

name: Quantum-Phoenix Blue
flavor: A pattern born from waveform flux in the probability kilns of the City.

name: Queen's Arrow
flavor: City artists created this pattern to honor the Queen of the Awoken.

name: Racer's Scarf
flavor: All your rivals will see are your contrails in the distance.

name: Red Eclipse Cloak
flavor: Still we shine.

name: Rihla Mantle
flavor: The City is hungry for tales of your exploits.

name: Rustworn Cloak
flavor: It's been stained and torn by old metal. But whatever it went through, it survived.

name: Shattered Vault Cloak
flavor: The machines are not invincible.

name: Shroud of Flies
flavor: They gather where death steps.

name: Silent Specter
flavor: We linger in the wild, stalking and exploring without a sound.

name: Solar Flayer Mantle
flavor: A mantle of woven Solar energy strings taken from the Psion Flayer Vatch.

name: Spektar Aspriet Cloak
flavor: "Fly high. Strike hard. Repeat." —Ain Suhu-ässä

name: Spektar Cloak
flavor: More than one color stains the battlefield.

name: Spektar Heliopause Cloak
flavor: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

name: Spektar Infinite Cloak
flavor: …pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

name: Spektar Kallipolis Cloak
flavor: Not the past, not the future. The present is where we should turn our eyes.

name: Squid Pro Quo
flavor: "Yes, my love for cephalopods is well documented." —Pahanin Errata

name: Strength of the Pack
flavor: A pattern worn by Ana Bray during the fateful battle of the Twilight Gap.

name: Takanome Ranger's Hood
flavor: In the darkest days of the Dark Age, camouflage was our only defense.

name: The Ishtar Dilemma
flavor: Never did answer Sundaresh's question, now did we?

name: Tracker's Wrap
flavor: This cut-down cloak marks the bearer as a rising Hunter, newly reborn and eager to roam.

name: Trailblazer's Hood
flavor: You're the first! At least, the first to live to tell about it.

name: Unbelievably Old Cloak
flavor: Look at all that...character.

name: Vaquero's Cloak
flavor: Never did like being in one place for too long.

name: Venom of Ikaheka
flavor: The sigil of the snake, said to represent the fluid lethality of a true Hunter.

name: Void Flayer Mantle
flavor: A mantle of woven Void energy strings taken from the Psion Flayer Numoc.

name: Warden's Hood
flavor: "I always target Taken Psions first. That way I use one bullet instead of 20." —Cayde-6

name: Wetwork Cloak
flavor: [this passage intentionally redacted]

name: Wolfswood Cloak
flavor: In our darkest hour, nine Iron Wolves emerged from the ruins.

name: Wolves' Cloak
flavor: "Run with me, we've new trails to stalk."

name: Nanomania Cloak
flavor: Habitats, equipment, repairs of all kinds—all of these things can be made from one material. ~SIVA.MEM.WB003

name: Cloak of Fast Resolve
flavor: "Don't second-guess yourself." —Ain Suhu-ässä

name: Novgorod Cloak
flavor: "A Hunter back from a quest? Now that's the best storyteller in the galaxy." —Cayde-6

name: Eon Tracer Cloak
flavor: "We trace the history of war throughout the ages." —Lakshmi-2

name: High Command Cloak
flavor: "The City demands a leader. Now, before it is too late." —Executor Hideo

name: Endling Cloak
flavor: "I am haunted by the Endling, the last living human." —Arach Jalaal

name: Idylls of the Iron Lords
flavor: "The tale of the Iron Lords is not over." —Lord Saladin Forge

name: Iron Saga Cloak
flavor: "The worlds still need the Iron Lords." —Lord Saladin

name: Lion's Vigil Cloak
flavor: "When we hunt together, we cannot fail." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Cloak of Legends
flavor: The cloak of a Hunter who's seen and done it all and lived to tell the tale.
